csw.services.alarms

Class AlarmMonitorActor$

  • java.lang.Object
    • csw.services.alarms.AlarmMonitorActor$

  • public class AlarmMonitorActor$
extends java.lang.Object
    An actor that monitors selected subsystem or component health and notifies a method or another actor of changes in the health status.

    • Method Detail

      • props

        public akka.actor.Props props(AlarmService alarmService,
                              AlarmKey alarmKey,
                              scala.Option<akka.actor.ActorRef> subscriber,
                              scala.Option<scala.Function1<AlarmModel.AlarmStatus,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit>> notifyAlarm,
                              scala.Option<scala.Function1<AlarmModel.HealthStatus,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit>> notifyHealth,
                              boolean notifyAll)
        Used to create the actor.

        Parameters:
        alarmService - used to get an alarm's severity and state
        alarmKey - key matching all the alarms for a subsystem or component, etc.
        subscriber - an optional actor that will receive HealthStatus and AlarmStatus messages
        notifyHealth - an optional function that will be called with HealthStatus messages
        notifyAll - if true, all severity changes are reported (for example, for logging), otherwise only the relevant changes in alarms are reported, for alarms that are not shelved and not out of service, and where the latched severity or calculated health actually changed
        notifyAlarm - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
